truth: What is one thing you would change about your relationship?
What is the most adventurous thing you have done together?
What is your partner's biggest pet peeve?
Have you ever had a crush on someone else while in this relationship?
What is the most annoying habit your partner has?
What is the most embarrassing thing that has happened to you as a couple?
What is your partner's favorite way to relax?
Have you ever lied to your partner? If so, about what?
What is the best compliment your partner has given you?
What is one thing you would like your partner to do more often?
dare: Kiss your partner on the cheek.
Share a piece of chocolate with your partner without using your hands.
Dance with your partner for one minute without any music.
Let your partner tickle you for 30 seconds.
Share an embarrassing moment from your past with your partner.
Do a dramatic reading of a love poem to your partner.
Draw a heart on your partner's hand and kiss it.
Share your most recent dream with your partner.
